Class CelestialBody

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.physics.classical.mechanics.Particle
org.jscience.physics.astronomy.CelestialBody
Direct Known Subclasses:
Planet, RingSystem, Star
public class CelestialBody extends Particle
Represents a celestial body (Star, Planet, Moon, etc.). Extends Particle for kinematic simulation. Modernized to JScience.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
